section.title: video
section.para: Sends a full chunk of audio video to the client. This chunk must be a full, self-contained, video file encoded with the codec specified by the mimetype given, which must be a mimetype previously specified by the client during the handshake procedure.

listitem.para: The index of the layer to stream the video data into. Future drawing operations into this layer will block until the video has finished playing. Playback of this video will not block operations in other layers.
The mimetype of the video data being sent.
The duration of the video data being sent, in milliseconds. This value may be a decimal, and need not be expressed in whole milliseconds.
